sentences.en: These front-line defences are backed up by armoured units in reserve.
sentences.cn: 前线防御有后备装甲部队的支援。

sentences.en: He now favors giving front-line workers more responsibility.
sentences.cn: 现在，他赞成给予一线工人更多责任的观点。

sentences.en: Information officers are in the front line of putting across government policies.
sentences.cn: 新闻官员们处在传达政府政策的前线。
